title: On Scaring Some Water Fowl - complex comparison

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Burns uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex comparison between the waterfowl and humans.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Burns uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex comparison between the waterfowl and humans.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
